name: MiniBoard
description:
Description

Miniboard is a free board game! The game included minigame inbetween round! Challenge your friends to get the most crown! This game supports 2-4 players! All share 1 Keyboard!

As all players use the same keyboard for the mini game! There must be a lot of controls! Here they are:

Player 1 A D

Player 2 left Arrow Right Arrow

Player 3 K ‘

Player 4 NUMPAD1 NUM PAD 3

currently the game has an issue with not display the mini game selector text. Press q to start the mini game!
Download 

Download for Windows

  • Unzip File.
  • Open "MiniBoard" Folder
  • Run "MiniBoard.exe".
  • Enjoy!
